TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Authorization extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含網際網路伺服器的驗證訊息。

span.span: Contains an authentication message for an Internet server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的執行個體類別，其中包含驗證訊息。The returns an instance of the class that contains an authentication message. 此訊息會傳送到網際網路伺服器，以指出用戶端 (例如或其中一個子系) 已獲授權存取伺服器。This message is sent to the Internet server to indicate that the client (such as or one of its descendants) is authorized to access the server. 驗證模組會建立執行個體，指定來處理要求。The instance is created by the authentication module that the designates to handle the request.

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string token) cil managed

param.name: token
param.span: 伺服器預期的加密授權訊息。

span.span: The encrypted authorization message expected by the server.

summary.span: 使用指定的授權訊息來建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified authorization message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建立執行個體屬性設定為`token`和屬性設定為`true`。The instance is created with the property set to `token` and the property set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立物件。The following code example shows how to create an object. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example, refer to the class. span.span: A unique identifier that can be used to create private client-server connections that are bound only to this authentication scheme.

summary.span: 使用指定的授權訊息、完成狀態和連接群組識別項，來建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified authorization message, completion status, and connection group identifier.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體類別具有指定的授權訊息、 完成狀態和連線群組識別碼。The following code example creates a new instance of the class with the specified authorization message, completion status, and connection group identifier. [!code-cpp[Authorization_Constructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Authorization_Constructor3/CPP/authorization_constructor3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Authorization_Constructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Authorization_Constructor3/CS/authorization_constructor3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Authorization_Constructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Authorization_Constructor3/VB/authorization_constructor3.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Complete As Boolean
public: property bool Complete { bool get(); };

span.span: Gets the completion status of the authorization.

value.span: 如果驗證程序已經完成，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the authentication process is complete; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為`true`用戶端與伺服器之間的驗證程序完成時。The property is set to `true` when the authentication process between the client and the server is finished. 某些驗證模組，例如 Kerberos 模組，以完成驗證程序使用多個用戶端與伺服器之間的往返。Some authentication modules, such as the Kerberos module, use multiple round trips between the client and server to complete the authentication process. 要保留或起始驗證程序中斷，進行授權時，驗證模組設定的下階屬性`false`。To keep the or descendant that initiated the authentication process from interrupting while authorization is taking place, the authentication module sets the property to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來取得授權的完成狀態。The following code example uses the property to get the completion status of the authorization. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionGroupId As String
public: property System::String ^ ConnectionGroupId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用者特定連接的唯一識別項。

span.span: Gets a unique identifier for user-specific connections.

value.span: 將連接與驗證實體 (Entity) 產生關聯的唯一字串。

span.span: A unique string that associates a connection with an authenticating entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是將連接與驗證的特定實體相關聯的唯一字串。The property is a unique string that associates a connection with a specific authenticating entity. 比方說，NTLM 授權模組繫結至特定的連接，以防止無效的重複使用連接的驗證認證資訊。For example, the NTLM authorization module ties the authentication credential information to a specific connection to prevent invalid reuse of the connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來取得伺服器所傳回的群組識別碼。The following code example uses the property to get the group identifier returned by the server. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得傳回給伺服器的訊息來回應驗證要求。

span.span: Gets the message returned to the server in response to an authentication challenge.

value.span: 取得傳回給伺服器的訊息來回應驗證要求。

span.span: The message that will be returned to the server in response to an authentication challenge.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含存取受保護資源時，將會傳回至伺服器的用戶端的授權字串。The property contains the authorization string that the client will return to the server when accessing protected resources. 訊息的實際內容是由用戶端和伺服器所使用的驗證類型定義。The actual contents of the message are defined by the authentication type the client and server are using. 基本 HTTP 驗證，例如，使用不同的訊息比 Kerberos 驗證。Basic HTTP authentication, for example, uses a different message than Kerberos authentication. 當驗證模組支援預先驗證時，屬性會與初始要求傳送。When an authentication module supports preauthentication, the property is sent with the initial request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來取得訊息傳回到伺服器以驗證挑戰回應。The following code example uses the property to get the message returned to the server in response to an authentication challenge. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MutuallyAuthenticated { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，指出是否發生過相互驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether mutual authentication occurred.

value.span: 如果用戶端和伺服器都已驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if both client and server were authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`false`如果驗證未完成。This property returns `false` if the authentication has not completed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ProtectionRealm { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可以使用 屬性進行驗證的統一資源識別元 (URI) 前置詞。

span.span: Gets or sets the prefix for Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) that can be authenticated with the property.

value.span: 包含 URI 前置詞的字串陣列。

span.span: An array of strings that contains URI prefixes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含一份 URI 前置詞，屬性可以用來進行驗證。The property contains a list of URI prefixes that the property can be used to authenticate. 和其子系比較這份清單的 URI 來判斷如果適用於特定的 URI。 and its descendants compare a URI to this list to determine if the is valid for a particular URI. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得或設定可以使用驗證的 Uri 前置詞屬性。The following code example gets or sets the prefix for URIs that can be authenticated with the property. [!code-cpp[Authorization_ProtectionRealm#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Authorization_ProtectionRealm/CPP/authorization_protectionrealm.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Authorization_ProtectionRealm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Authorization_ProtectionRealm/CS/authorization_protectionrealm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Authorization_ProtectionRealm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Authorization_ProtectionRealm/VB/authorization_protectionrealm.vb#1)]
